Reza: It’s a good thing that you got here so quickly, Echo. I have to say it’s good to see you.

Echo: You too Reza, but let’s get to business. What is the plan? I wasn’t told anything substantial because they didn’t want the information to leak.

Reza: The only way into the inner part of the city is through a checkpoint a few blocks from here. You have to get past it in order to get anywhere near the Tower.
Within the administrative building in front of us there is an elevator that takes you to the roof. From the roof you can descend next to the checkpoint and sneak past the guards.
There are no automated defenses but the guards are perceptive. Stay away from their spotlights. If you’re seen, hide.
There should also be a couple of civilians in the administrative building. If you find either one of them, use your resonance device and undo their brainwashing.
They should be able to leave by themselves once you’ve used your device. Save both of them if it is at all possible, so that our work to save them won’t be wasted.

Echo: I’ll travel through the building and save the civilians while I’m at it. Piece of cake.

Reza: I appreciate your confidence but be careful. You’re our only hope. Harmony is waiting for you at the next designated point. Good luck.
